review: Roku or Google Chrome?  $99 vs $39?  Easily for the price and performance differences Chromcast is the winner.  Got it stuck it into the USB socket in the TV, pair it with your device and you are in business. Anything that you can stream on your device can be streamed to your TV with the same quality.  If the original video is HD, it will play HD on your TV.  Simple, works great.
